name: Gar Gould
text: Cuz it is easy access good fast food the real deal

name: April Belisle
text: Super yummy!!! The workers were nice.

name: Corey Deruiter
text: I ordered 1 large 2 topping pizza along with a cheese bread for delivery. This order had an estimated delivery time of 40 mins. Granted this establishment is 4 miles from my house, so I figured o well. It has now been 1:45 mins, with a call â€¦More

name: Mark Kilmer
text: Ordered some pizzas, they were quick and delicious as expected.

name: Brandon O
text: Small, extra cheese,,

name: Roger Sturdavant
text: Got the ham..bacon..and pineapple pizza.. And chocolate chip cookie. Both were really good. Delivered in a timely manner. Love Hungry Howie's.

name: caleb olson
text: Called in and ordered a couple pizzas for pickup they said 15 to 20 and when I arrive 30 mins later they hadn't even started the order. And what I guess as being the manager says she had no calls for pickup. They had at least 5 ppl working with no one in the store and can't even take orders correctly....

name: Christopher Gritzmaker
text: Food is great & delivery is fast buy my only issue is they don't let people order online who have cash. Major inconvenience for not only myself but many others in the area.

name: PupMomLeahsDailyBark PupMomDailyRuff
text: Dont try to order online wowzers what a headache. I am excited for the day that is possible and give it another shot. Just to get out of the house. And give business back to businesses.  Other then just being in the house.

name: Kelsey Veenendall
text: If I could give 0 stars I would. Worst customer service for their own mistake. Wonâ€™t be ordering again or recommending them ever.

name: Daniel Beattie
text: My favorite In Kent County!

name: Randy Townsend
text: Store had good service and was clean.

name: Trevor Johnson
text: Took hours to get to my house and when we called they didn't tell us why it was late

name: Yvonne Ortiz
text: Iâ€™m from Grand Rapids, Mi but I was in the area and ordered pizza but once I got there they did not receive my order and showed no sympathy whatsoever. I asked if they can make it and I also had proof that I have received a confirmation email that they got my order but itâ€™s not like it mattered to them.

name: S Hart
text: Ordered online and was given the 20 minutes and your order will be ready message.  I got there about 25 minutes after placing the order they had me pay for the order then informed me it wasn't ready yet.  They said it was being worked on â€¦More

name: Sally Grayvold
text:
Certain of their choices are overpriced for what you get.  Cheese bread orders are not worth the money for the amount served.
Pizza is good...lot of choices.
Service fairly quick.

name: Nick Mixen
text: terrible employees. pizza is only good half the time. so yeah I'm never going there again.

name: a berg
text: Cedar Springs Hungry Howie's crew is horrible! Terrible timing for orders, terrible customer service, terrible management. Go elsewhere for any kind of reliability.

name: Chelsea Dadd
text: Chocolate chip cookie pizza is worth it everytime.

name: Kathy Kent
text: They have good food

name: T. Andrew Westra
text: Ordered 1 pizza for delivery - a 1 topping pizza nonetheless...took 2 hours for it to be delivered and it was cold.  I've had frozen pizza 10x better than this.  When I called to see where the pizza was, I was told sorry, there are only two â€¦More

name: Adam VerBurg
text: Great food and normally excellent people

name: Starting Over
text: 4 pies 2 Breadsticks $44

name: Charles Guerrero
text: Horrible customer service! Dont recommend this location!

name: Chad Jensen
text: They have an excuse for everything. Not once has a pickup order has ever been done on time. I usually have to wait at least 20 minutes after the given time. I would have gave it less stars if there was an option.

name: Kelsey Long
text: Very poor service. They messed up my order a month ago and I called 2 weeks ago to see if my coupons were sent out and they said yes. I called today because I never received my coupons and the GM Jenny got very rude with me because they â€¦More

name: Jaclyn Deboer
text: The food is always good, and the place looks clean, but they tend to be rude. Both in person, and on the phone. They need to learn some customer service skills.

name: Alex Hepke
text: Called to order and it took 10 mins for them to figure out how to "use" there system and i came to pick up my order after the employee hung up without telling me how long till its ready... showed up after 15 mins they seemed lost.. the walk in behind me got there pizza at the same time as i did after waiting 30 mins...

name: Danielle Mehney
text: Great food great people!!!

name: mitchell redding
text: Over cooked.......

name: Ronald Brammer
text: My favorite local pizza place. They have an awesome selection and great prices. I just love the flavored crust. Customer for life...:)

name: Michelle Chatman
text: Very disappointed with the pizza lately. I ordered last night at 5pm, 7pm came around so I called asking where my pizza was, all they said was "it'd be there soon" then hung up. Once I got the pizza it was cold and looked old. Called to see â€¦More

name: James Fisher
text: Great subs and pizza. Great service

name: Elizabeth Wolever
text: Amazing food

name: Julie Snoeyink
text: Love the pizza and flavored crust

name: Cindy Strickland
text: Clean place. Wonderful food. Excellent service

name: BikerMan 2000
text: Good pizza. Large delivery radius. Large range of specials for all occasions and appetites

name: Erik Schroeder
text: Decent food good service

name: noha â€¢
text: My favorite pizza place. The pizza is very good and is made very fast. I suggest to Butter Cheese crust option if you love cheese.

name: holly ostrom
text: Best delivery drivers around!!

name: andrew stich
text: Very good  pizza

name: Adam Fahling
text: It's a very interesting place as it dances the line between being a simple corporate franchise pizza place yet also tries to be have the feel of a local town pizzeria. Admittedly, the food can be hit or miss depending on the day, and the â€¦More

name: Jake Benton
text: Thin crust was made well and breadsticks too. Ordered a pizza with extra sauce and got a soup.

name: Jeannie Lee
text: Pizzas always over cooked and too hard to eat.

name: ROBERT REED
text: Fast and courteous service, pizza and bread sticks came out great! I've been to this location dozens of times and every time has been a great experience!

name: Scott Hammond
text: Always get great pizza from here.

name: Joan Lay
text: Excellent stuffed crust pizza.

name: Dan Siegrist
text: As far as Hungry Howie's pizzerias go, this is tops of the chain. I usually order in person and go next door to peruse the video selection. Always ready and hot before I leave with a video. If I could just get them to knock on the wall to let me know it is done, that would be even better.

name: Amanda Peterson
text: Great pizza but really pricey for what we got... Two large pizza with 3 or 4 toppings each and Serria mist for $48!!! I called back and luckily I got a different person. She said that I should have gotten a discount and was able to drop it â€¦More

name: Arron Guiles
text: The pizza is always the same at all locations

name: Jordan M
text: Friendly staff, good pizza, reasonable price.

name: Matt Babcock
text: Bacon Chicken Ranch pizza with sesame crust is spectacular when you add extra BACON !

name: LJH_ Beast116
text: Delicious, great service

name: Tammy Babcock
text: Ordered a bacon/chicken/ranch pizza tonight with sesame crust and IT WAS SO AMAZING!!!

name: Parker Smith
text: Had some howie rolls and loved them for about three hours then I instantly got stomach pain. Enough pain for me to be crippled over in pain. Come to find out it was food posining.

name: loraine wilber

name: Big Lake
text: ordered 8 pizzas for my daughter's birthday, all with different crusts and toppings, they made them all perfect and on time, plus great deals using online coupons. I would recommend them.
